title: Laser-induced reduced graphene oxide for high-performance electrochemical sensors of antipyretic drug in real samples
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,951-968
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00780D, Paper
Kuo-Yuan Hwa, Ravikumar Murugan, Shih-Feng Tseng, Aravindan Santhan, Jhih-Yi Lin
Laser-induced graphene (LIG) has gained dominance recently as a very sought after material for fabrication, patterning graphitic structures, and electrodes for various applications in electronics.
